channel.title: I need Client Hacking Coders
channel.description:
Hello.
I see all those clients that people make, but I don't know how to make them. I need people who have MSN, and can code clients. I can get the graphics and I will be telling you how I want it to look like. I need two coders that are active on the computer atleast 3 hours a day. You will be payed In RS if you would like, or you will be just put in the credits or you name will be displayed in the client.
TO APPLY:
[code]Name: (Just first) Client coding/Java Coding experience: How often and long you are on the computer:[/code]
Thank you to everybody who wants to help.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2007, 09:24:01 AM[/size][hr]any1 want to help?

item.title: I need Client Hacking Coders
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Rep doesn’t mean anything anymore, Unid.

Eclipse, coding clients is not very hard. Get a basic one, look through client.java, follow tutorials, study the code there, compare to other codes, and wa lah, you know all about clients. You want a link to one? Here: http://zendurl.com/tscape/releases/TeleScape_Webclient.zip (It works as a client) Use that.

To edit the background, look in class32_sub2_sub1_sub1.java, and look for a URL. Change that to your background.

Read full topic
